snippet: The United Nations has sent out invitations to an international summit to address the conflict in Syria, called Geneva Two, which is scheduled to begin on Jan. 22 in Montreux, Switzerland.
abstract: The United Nations has sent out invitations to an international summit to address the conflict in Syria, called Geneva Two, which is scheduled to begin on Jan. 22 in Montreux, Switzerland.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD, LIAM STACK and HEATHER MURPHY
